Text: REYou guys could be off to the drag races Original Message From mailto Sent Friday October AM To Subject RE i dont know but we would be the prettiest in the industry Original Message From Hal Lenhart ENRON Sent Friday October AM To Lenhart Matthew Subject RE Revlon Hmmmcute How do you feel about trading mascera Original Message From mailto Sent Friday October AM To Subject RE sorry i had to run last night so the word is now that enron has about or companies looking to take us over aol lucent revlon and a few others i will give you a call later Original Message From Hal Lenhart ENRON Sent Wednesday October AM To Lenhart Matthew Subject RE It looks that way Maybe I should sell to spark a rally Hope things are going well otherwise Talk to you soon Original Message From Lenhart Matthew mailtoMatthew NRONcom Sent Wednesday October AM To Subject enron is going to be a penny stock pretty soon sec is investigating now This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you

REHavent read it yet Original Message From mailto Sent Thursday October AM To Subject RE did you see the article in the wsj today on that ljm fund associated with ene Original Message From Hal Lenhart ENRON Sent Thursday October AM To Lenhart Matthew Subject RE Every thing is good here Tom and I played golf yesterday at Fox Hollow beautiful day unfortunately cant say the same for our golf game Enron is sure in the press Seems like your hotdog McKinnsey expresident and CFO are much more adept at accounting sleights of hand than actually running the company Original Message From Lenhart Matthew mailtoMatthew NRONcom Sent Wednesday October AM To Subject sorry i havent called you back i am in portland i dont get back until tonight i will call you when i get home hope all is well This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you
